## Data

```{r}
load('./nmes.rdata')

# define mscd
nmes$mscd <- ifelse(nmes$lc5==1 | nmes$chd5==1, 1, 0)

# remove incomplete cases
nmes <- nmes[nmes$eversmk!='.',]

# mscd vs. eversmk
nmes$eversmk <- as.integer(nmes$eversmk)
t <- table(nmes$mscd, nmes$eversmk)
colnames(t) <- c("Never smoked", "Smoked")
rownames(t) <- c("No MSCD", "MSCD")
t
```

## Model

$$
\begin{align*}
[\text{MSCD}_i | \text{eversmk}_i, \alpha, \beta, \gamma] &\sim \text{Bernoulli}(\theta_i)\\
\text{logit}(\theta_i) &= \alpha + \beta \gamma \text{eversmk}_i\\
\alpha &\sim \text{Normal}(0, 10)\\
\beta &\sim \text{Normal}(0, 2) \\
\gamma &\sim \text{Bernoulli}(0.5).
\end{align*}
$$
